resources.string: New levels will added. Now you can rate the game.
You have 100 sites. How to make a million dollars with? Answer in one word:
You have a cube-shaped piece of cheese and a knife. How many cuts do you need to make with a knife to cut the cheese into 27 cubes?
How many times a day do all three hands of the clock overlap each other? Answer with a number:

You communicate with Alice through correspondence through Bob\'s intermediary. You need to find out whether Alice KNOWS your phone number, but you cannot ask about it directly in the correspondence, since you do not want Bob to find out your phone number. Think about how to do this and write a message to Alice:
How to find out the sum of numbers A and B using the subtraction sign (-)?
How do you know the weight of your own head without separating it from the body? Hint: it needs to be placed somewhere. Write in one word where:
What is the angle on the clock between the hour and minute hands at 3:15?

You need to choose one of the rates. With bet A, you need to throw the basketball into the basket. If you hit, you will receive $ 1000. If you bet B, you need to hit two times out of three throws, then you will also receive $ 1000. Which rate is more preferable?
Add any arithmetic symbols to the following equation to make the equation true: 3136 = 8. Write down the completed equation:
